stories.headline: Nursing Home Neglect: Unraveled care
stories.author_title: The Indianapolis Star and The Indianapolis News
stories.summary: An investigative series revealed widespread neglect in nursing homes, prompting immediate reforms in the elder care regulatory system by Indiana state officials.

stories.headline: Spreading Hazards: Toxic two-time
stories.summary: An investigation into how hazardous wastes are repurposed as fertilizers led to significant media attention and policy reforms, highlighting the inadequate regulation of toxic byproducts.
